name: circularjs
description: Tiny and fast SPA creation tool (MVC like framework with templating engine, router, pubsub, etc.)

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs amd.js toolbox.js schnauzer.js blick.js VOM.js api.js controller.js circular.js -o circular.min.js --source-map 'url=circular.min.js.map' -c -m
scripts.combine: uglifyjs amd.js toolbox.js schnauzer.js blick.js VOM.js api.js controller.js circular.js -o circular.all.js -b

author: Peter Dematt√©
